text: I’m also exploring the possibility on doing pattern match on Julia SSA

elements.text: I’m also exploring the possibility on doing pattern match on Julia SSA

text: so the current problem is actually I don’t have much use cases that make pattern match useful tho, but would be nice to make some of the things work with MLStyle. we may have something like LLVM that manages a user defined rewrite function
